meanings.definition: A group of diseases characterized by the abnormal deposition of amyloid protein in various tissues of the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that amyloidoses can affect different parts of the body.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying ways to treat amyloidoses effectively.
meanings.sent3: Amyloidoses decided to throw a party in the liver, much to the dismay of the other organs.
meanings.sent4: The spread of amyloidoses in the body was like an unwelcome guest overstaying its welcome.
meanings.sent5: Amyloidoses in the tissues is like a silent intruder disrupting the body's harmony.
